casebody.data:
CAPPS
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES et al. No. 383A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Norman W. Shearin, Jr., Kitty Hawk, for NW Sign Industries, et al. Jared E. Gardner, Charlotte, for Capps.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of October 2005 by Defendants to Suspend Rules and/or Extend Time to File Appellant's Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
